web.branding.current_label_modelvalue_cl.en: Current {0}: {1}. Click to cycle through options.
web.branding.current_label_modelvalue_cl.translation: Ko te {0} o nāianei: {1}. Pāwhiri ki te huri i ngā kōwhiringa.

web.branding.preview_of_the_secret_link_.en: Preview of recipient's view when accessing your secure link
web.branding.preview_of_the_secret_link_.translation: Arokite o te tirohanga a te kaiwhiwhi ina urunga ki tō hononga haumaru

web.branding.switch_to_safari_browser_vi.translation: Takahuri ki te tirohanga pūtirotiro Safari

web.branding.switch_to_edge_browser_view.translation: Takahuri ki te tirohanga pūtirotiro Edge

web.branding.example_pre_reveal_instruct.en: Use your phone to scan the QR code
web.branding.example_pre_reveal_instruct.translation: Whakamahia tō waea ki te matawai i te waehere QR

web.branding.example_post_reveal_instruc.translation: Whakapā atu ki te onboarding{'@'}example.com me ngā pātai katoa

web.branding.these_instructions_will_be_.en: These instructions will be shown to recipients before they reveal the secret content
web.branding.these_instructions_will_be_.translation: Ka whakaatuhia ēnei tohutohu ki ngā kaiwhiwhi i mua i te whakaatu i te ihirangi karere huna

web.branding.these_instructions_will_be_.en: These instructions will be shown to recipients after they reveal the secret
web.branding.these_instructions_will_be_.translation: Ka whakaatuhia ēnei tohutohu ki ngā kaiwhiwhi whai muri i te whakaatu i te karere huna

web.branding.click_to_upload_a_logo_with.en: Click to upload a logo. Recommended size: 128x128 pixels. Maximum file size: 1MB. Supported formats: PNG, JPG, SVG
web.branding.click_to_upload_a_logo_with.translation: Pāwhiri ki te tukuake i tētahi tohu. Rahinga tūtohu: 128x128 ngā pika. Rahi kōnae mōrahi: 1MB. Ngā whakatakotoranga tautokona: PNG, JPG, SVG

web.branding.preview_how_recipients_will.en: Preview how recipients will see your secrets by testing the "View Secret" button
web.branding.preview_how_recipients_will.translation: Titiro tīpako ka pēhea te kitenga o ō karere huna e ngā kaiwhiwhi mā te whakamātau i te pātene "Tirohia te Karere Huna"

web.branding.click_the_preview_image_bel.en: Click the preview image below to update your logo (minimum 128x128 pixels recommended, 1MB max)
web.branding.click_the_preview_image_bel.translation: Pāwhiri te awhiata arokite i raro nei ki te whakahou i tō tohu (tūtohu 128x128 ngā pika, 1MB max)

web.branding.use_the_controls_above_to_c.en: Use the controls above to customize brand color, styles, and recipient instructions
web.branding.use_the_controls_above_to_c.translation: Whakamahia ngā tohutoro i runga ake ki te whakarite i te tae waitohu, ngā kāhua, me ngā tohutohu kaiwhiwhi

web.branding.you_have_unsaved_changes_ar.en: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure?
web.branding.you_have_unsaved_changes_ar.translation: He whakarerekētanga tiaki-kore āu. E tino hiahia ana koe?

web.branding.failed_to_load_brand_settin.translation: I rahua te uta i ngā tautuhinga waitohu

web.branding.this_is_an_interactive_prev.en: This is an interactive preview of how recipients will see your secure messages. You can: - Customize colors and fonts using the controls above - Upload a logo (minimum 128x128 pixels recommended, 1MB max) - Test the preview using the "View Secret" button
web.branding.this_is_an_interactive_prev.translation: He arokite pāhekoheko tēnei o te pēhea e kite ai ngā kaiwhiwhi i ō karere haumaru. Ka taea e koe te: - Whakarite i ngā tae me ngā momotuhi mā ngā tohutoro i runga ake - Tukuake i tētahi tohu (tūtohu 128x128 ngā pika, 1MB max) - Whakamātau i te arokite mā te pātene "Tirohia te Karere Huna"

web.branding.this_is_an_interactive_prev.en: This is an interactive preview of how recipients will see your secure messages. You can: - Customize colors and fonts using the controls above - Upload a logo (minimum 128x128 pixels recommended, 1MB max) - Test the preview using the "View Secret" button
web.branding.this_is_an_interactive_prev.translation: He arokite pāhekoheko tēnei o te pēhea e kite ai ngā kaiwhiwhi i ō karere haumaru. Ka taea e koe te: - Whakarite i ngā tae me ngā momotuhi mā ngā tohutoro i runga ake - Tukuake i tētahi tohu (tūtohu 128x128 ngā pika, 1MB max) - Whakamātau i te arokite mā te pātene "Tirohia te Karere Huna"
